author: Soo Kim
title: Coronavirus Update, Map As Cases Pass 387,000, China Eases Lockdown in Wuhan, Italy Sees Drop in Cases
description: Italy has seen a slight drop in cases over the past few days, while the U.S. saw nearly 100 more deaths in a day.
content:
The coronavirus has spread to over 387,000 people across at least 169 countries. Over 102,000 have recovered from infection, while the death toll has surpassed 16,700, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
Italy saw a slight decline … [+7535 chars]
